bug.short_desc: SELinux is preventing 57656220436F6E74656E74 from 'create' accesses on the file Kvitto-Dell-UP2516D.pdf.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: This happened when trying to "Print to file". This should definitely be allowed as it's used when printing recipts to disk. This happend when using the "Print to file" functionality of Firefox.
SELinux is preventing 57656220436F6E74656E74 from 'create' accesses on the file Kvitto-Dell-UP2516D.pdf.
***** Plugin mozplugger (99.1 confidence) suggests ************************
If you want to use the plugin package Then you must turn off SELinux controls on the Firefox plugins. Do # setsebool -P unconfined_mozilla_plugin_transition 0
***** Plugin catchall (1.81 confidence) suggests **************************
If you believe that 57656220436F6E74656E74 should be allowed create access on the Kvitto-Dell-UP2516D.pdf file by default. Then you should report this as a bug. You can generate a local policy module to allow this access. Do allow this access for now by executing: # ausearch -c '57656220436F6E74656E74' --raw | audit2allow -M my-57656220436F6E74656E74 # semodule -X 300 -i my-57656220436F6E74656E74.pp
Additional Information: Source Context unconfined_u:unconfined_r:mozilla_plugin_t:s0-s0:c 0.c1023 Target Context unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_dir_t:s0 Target Objects Kvitto-Dell-UP2516D.pdf [ file ] Source 57656220436F6E74656E74 Source Path 57656220436F6E74656E74 Port <Unknown> Host (removed) Source RPM Packages Target RPM Packages Policy RPM selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.6.fc25.noarch Selinux Enabled True Policy Type targeted Enforcing Mode Enforcing Host Name (removed) Platform Linux (removed) 4.9.7-201.fc25.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Feb 2 23:32:42 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 Alert Count 1 First Seen 2017-02-10 20:15:05 CET Last Seen 2017-02-10 20:15:05 CET Local ID 19bb9697-e3d4-4960-ad38-80501eaad162
Raw Audit Messages type=AVC msg=audit(1486754105.47:235): avc: denied { create } for pid=3270 comm=57656220436F6E74656E74 name="Kvitto-Dell-UP2516D.pdf" scontext=unconfined_u:unconfined_r:mozilla_plugin_t:s0-s0:c0.c1023 tcontext=unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_dir_t:s0 tclass=file permissive=0
Hash: 57656220436F6E74656E74,mozilla_plugin_t,user_home_dir_t,file,create
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.6.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.9.7-201.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport

Description of problem: Este error me aparecio mientras intentaba imprimir un archivo que estaba bajando desde una pagina web.
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.11.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.10.8-200.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport

Description of problem: I tried to print a PDF from firefox.
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-225.11.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.10.9-200.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport
Looks like it has been solved with the update "firefox-53.0-2.fc25.x86_64". Feel free to reopen this if you encounter hit this issue again.
*** Bug 1444238 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Description of problem: Attempting to print to a File using Firefox creates this issue.
